message: @rweald Noticed that too when I was in Safari. It would actually be nice if there was native support for the box expanding at least a little bit when you started to go multiline (or, just whenever you click on it, like on Twitter). It's hard to see your previous line so you lose the context of what you were saying.
Just wanted to let you know there is a small css bug that allows a user to expand the new message input box to the point that the submit button becomes inaccessible.
I would either lock the size of the input box or increase the size of the page when the user expands the box
